articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Apple’s Craig Federighi on the long road to the iPad’s Mac-like multitasking - Ars Technica
articles.description: Federighi talks to Ars about why the iPad’s Mac-style multitasking took so long.

articles.author: Zack Whittaker
articles.title: Whole Foods warns of shortages after cyberattack at its primary distributor UNFI - TechCrunch
articles.description: The retail giant described the food shortages as "temporary supply challenges" following the cyberattack at its primary distributor, UNFI.
articles.content:
Whole Foods told its employees that the ongoing outages and disruptions at its primary distributor, United Natural Foods (UNFI), may take “several days to resolve.”
